item.title: Rolex Oyster Perpetual Day-Date 36mm
item.dc:creator: Napeno
item.description:
The Rolex Oyster Perpetual Day-Date 36mm watch features the distinctive grooved bezel that is characteristic of Rolex. Initially, the watch...

The post Rolex Oyster Perpetual Day-Date 36mm appeared first on Ecommerce2.
item.content:encoded:
The Rolex Oyster Perpetual Day-Date 36mm watch features the distinctive grooved bezel that is characteristic of Rolex. Initially, the watch was created for easy rotation of the bezel and case to ensure maximum water resistance. Subsequently, a groove-like design on the back is securely screwed into the case, enhancing its exceptional waterproofing capability.

Since then, the grooved design has become a highly aesthetic detail of significant value in the Rolex brand’s style. As such, this watch model inherits that high aesthetic value, attracting many admiring eyes longing to possess it

The post Rolex Oyster Perpetual Day-Date 36mm appeared first on Ecommerce2.

item.description:
Specifications of SR Men's Watch SR3006.1402CV:

Case and strap material: 316 stainless steel with elegant gold plating

Glass material: Scratch-resistant Sapphire

Water resistance: 50M

Dial diameter: 39mm
